mapper.select: SELECT article_id, article_title, article_view_count, article_like_count, article_comment_count, article_summary, create_time FROM ty_article WHERE article_status like #{state} ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT article_id, article_title, article_view_count, article_like_count, article_comment_count, article_summary, create_time, article_status FROM ty_article WHERE 1=1
and article_title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT article_id, article_content, create_time, article_like_count, article_title, article_comment_count, article_view_count FROM ty_article WHERE article_id = #{articleId} AND article_status = 'publish'

SELECT a.article_title, a.article_summary, a.create_time, a.article_like_count, a.article_view_count, a.article_comment_count FROM ty_article a LEFT JOIN ty_article_label b ON a.article_id = b.article_id LEFT JOIN ty_label c ON b.label_id = c.label_id WHERE c.label_id = #{labelId} AND a.article_status like #{state}

SELECT article_id, article_title, article_view_count, article_like_count, article_comment_count, article_summary, create_time FROM ty_article WHERE article_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND article_status like #{state} ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT a.article_id, a.article_title, a.article_view_count, a.article_comment_count, a.article_summary, a.create_time FROM ty_article a JOIN ty_article_sort b ON a.article_id = b.article_id WHERE b.sort_id = #{sortId} AND a.article_status LIKE #{state} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM ty_article WHERE article_id = ( SELECT max(article_id) FROM ty_article WHERE article_id < #{articleId} AND article_status like 'publish')
SELECT * FROM ty_article WHERE article_id = ( SELECT min(article_id) FROM ty_article WHERE article_id > #{articleId} AND article_status like 'publish')
